English: I'm on vacation starting from June.
Starting from January shifts will get longer.
I'm working half-time starting from March.
Starting from August the buses ride more rarely.
The sun will shine until October.
Pay the loan back by August!
By December we will know the answers.
During what month does winter start?
I traveled to Tallinn last month.
I'm moving to Helsinki next month.
In this month there are 28 days.
I visit my sister once a month.

Finnish: Käyn isän haudalla kaksi kertaa kuussa
English: I visit my father's grave two times a month.

Finnish: Näen painajaisia suunnilleen kolme kertaa kuussa
English: I have nightmares about three times a month.
I gave birth to our baby a month ago.
I started the course two months ago.
My baby will be born in a month.
Hungarian: A babám egy hónap múlva fog megszületni

English: My course starts in two months' time.
Hungarian: A kurzusom két hónap múlva kezdődik

Finnish: Kuukauden kuluttua järvissä voi taas uida
English: A month from now you can swim in the lakes again.
Hungarian: Egy hónap múlva újra lehet úszni a tavakban

Finnish: Kolmen kuukauden kuluttua syksy alkaa taas
English: In three months' time autumn will start again.
Hungarian: Három hónap múlva újra kezdődik az ősz

English: In what month were you born?
I eat meat once a month.

Finnish: Maaliskuuhun asti voi vielä sataa lunta
English: It can still snow until March.

I've been trying to lose weight starting from April.
I started my studies a month ago.
I want to return to my home country in a month.
Hungarian: Egy hónap múlva szeretnék visszatérni a hazámba

English: Autumn lasts from September until December.
It snowed a lot in December.
The meeting is on the fifth of October.
